sentences.en: ...their desire to pursue a policy of detente.
sentences.cn: ...他们寻求两国关系缓和政策的渴望。

sentences.en: An effective world disarmament treaty should bring a detente in international tensions.
sentences.cn: 有效的世界裁军协定将带来国际紧张情势的缓和.

sentences.en: Detente for Brezhnev and Nixon, the same is profitable and necessary.
sentences.cn: 缓和对于勃列日涅夫和尼克松来说, 同样是有利可图的、必要的.

sentences.en: He warned against a fake detente that would sap resistance to expansionism.
sentences.cn: 他警告我们不要上假缓和的当,以免放松对扩张主义的斗争.

sentences.en: Many people say that detente is now a dead letter.
sentences.cn: 很多人说缓和国际紧张局势的论调已是明日黄花.

sentences.en: Remarkably, this detente - weaved with fine words rather than built with concrete actions - has held and even flourished.
sentences.cn: 引人瞩目的是, 两国保持了这种缓和关系 —— 建立在漂亮话而不是具体措施的基础上 —— 甚至还有所发展.

sentences.en: The course of detente has not been smooth or even.
sentences.cn: 缓和的道路也并非平平坦坦,畅通无阻.

sentences.en: They have lauded " detente " " peace " and'security " to the skies.
sentences.cn: 他们把 “ 缓和 ” 、 “ 和平 ” 、 “ 安全 ” 吹得天花乱坠.

sentences.en: They're trying in every way to create the false impressions of detente.
sentences.cn: 他们千方百计地制造“缓和”的假象.

sentences.en: We can't possibly believe the myth of " detente " now.
sentences.cn: 我们现在无论怎样也不相信 “ 缓和 ” 的神话了.

sentences.en: We could not permit our European associates to claim a monopoly on detente.
sentences.cn: 我们不能让我们的欧洲伙伴自称对缓和拥有垄断权.

words.tran_cn: （国际关系中紧张局面的）缓和

trans.tran_cn: （国际关系中紧张局面的）缓和
trans.tran_en: Detente is a state of friendly relations between two countries when previously there had been problems between them
